attributes.action: consider castration as a punishment for convicted rapists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the cases of repeat or violent offenders, this seems the most effective form of punishment; both serving to prevent them from re-offending and discourage others from committing such crimes.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/life-for-a-life/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
